description:
More than 15% shorter and 50 lumens brighter than Fenix’s next-best AA light. This compact flashlight has a setting for every situation, from reading in the tent, to “what’s that in the bushes?” Powered by 2 AAs, the world’s most commonly used battery, so you can find them wherever you are.

  • 4 modes: high (3.4h at 350 lumens), medium (11h at 150 lumens), low (93.3h at 30 lumens) and Eco (200h at 5 lumens)
  • Custom designed reflector mixes flood and spot lighting, with an 85° beam angle
  • Rugged aluminum body has type-III hard anodizing for an extra level of protection
  • IP68 waterproofing protects your light in any conditions (not built for use underwater)
  • Regulated output maintains constant brightness throughout battery life
  • Intuitive push-button tail cap switch cycles through modes
  • Semi deep-carry pocket clip included
  • In the box: E20 V2.0, lanyard, spare o-ring, 2 AA (alkaline) batteries, manual, and warranty card
name: Fenix E20 V2.0 Flashlight
